Lifestyles & Photos Homes Free Brochure About Kolter Homes A trusted homebuilder in the Southeast U.S., creating communities in Florida, Alabama, Georgia, North Carolina, and South Carolina. We help you find and personalize your ideal home with more choices and expert guidance at every step. Explore Communities More Options. More Guidance. More You. At Kolter Homes, your home should reflect the way you live. Across our communities in the Southeast, we offer more personalization choices than many competitors, averaging 27 structural options per floorplan, plus curated design selections to help you create a home that feels right from day one. Our homebuying process is designed to be clear and supportive, so you can move confidently from discovery to design to move-in. And with professional Design Studio services, personalizing your space is both inspiring and straightforward. Explore the Design Studio Personalization Avg. 27 structural options per plan, plus rich finish selections to match your style. Guided Process Clear steps from first visit to closing, with experts by your side so decisions feel easy. Desirable Locations Communities in areas known for mild climates and low taxes across the Southeast. Cresswind: Award-Winning 55+ Lifestyle Our Cresswind communities are designed for active adults, with a lifestyle program built around four pillars that enrich daily life and build lasting connections. Fitness Wellness, training, and amenities that keep you moving. Relationships Clubs, events, and a welcoming community spirit. Entertainment Spaces and programs for fun, performances, and play. Education Lectures, workshops, and lifelong learning opportunities. See the Cresswind Lifestyle A Homebuying Experience Designed for You 1. Discover Explore communities and floorplans with a knowledgeable team ready to help. 2. Personalize Choose from structural options (avg. 27 per plan) and design selections. 3. Build Craftsmanship, quality checks, and clear communication throughout construction. 4. Move-In & Beyond Close with confidence, our team remains a resource long after move-in. Personalize a Home That’s Right for You Guided appointments make selections simple and enjoyable, bringing your vision to life with finishes, fixtures, and features that suit your style. See Design Inspiration Why the Southeast From the Atlantic coast to vibrant inland towns, our locations are chosen for mild climates, lower taxes, everyday convenience, and authentic local culture. Year-round outdoor living and recreation Growing job markets and thriving downtowns Access to beaches, parks, dining, and entertainment “The number of choices surprised us, in a good way. The team guided us through each step, and we ended up with a home that feels uniquely ours.” — Kolter Homebuyer Ready to Find Your Community? Structural Options 33 Build your home Video Included Features Floorplan Exteriors Floorplan Exteriors About this floorplan Flexibility is core to the layout of this one-story, 3-Bedroom home. The centrally located island Kitchen anchors the Madeline, and the Great Room, Dining area and Flex space can serve both casual and formal living. One example is to utilize the Flex space as a formal Dining Room, allowing you to expand the Great Room and use the Dining area for cards, games or billiards. The secondary bedrooms are located in the front of the Madeline, with the Owner’s Suite comfortably tucked off the Great Room in the rear. Highlights of this sanctuary include a tray ceiling, split vanities, and wrap-around Walk-In Closet that gives you the option to add a door from your Closet directly into the Laundry. You can personalize the Madeline floorplan with structural options that include three different exterior choices; second-floor Bonus Room variations; Fitness/Study or Bedroom 4 in lieu of Flex; In-Law Suite or second Owner’s Suite in lieu of Flex & Bedroom 2; four-foot rear extension of home, and if you're looking for more stow space, add light Attic storage and/or extend the Garage. To learn about all the ways you can have this home built around you, contact an Astor Creek New Home Guide. Homesites, given their appeal and location within the community, may carry an additional cost. This cost is not reflected in the base price of this floorplan. Astor Creek Golf & Country Club includes an 18-hole championship golf course designed by Chris Wilczynski. Astor Creek Golf & Country Club Astor Creek Golf & Country Club is an all new premier gated, golf course community located in Port St. Lucie, Florida located just west of PGA Verano, also a product of Kolter Homes. Astor Creek Port St Lucie Homes For Sale include new construction single family homes that are all one-story floor plans, with an optional second floor bonus room, situated on beautifully landscaped golf course and water views. Kolter focuses on personalization where there are over 40 structural options you can customize to fit you and your family's needs.In addition to Kolter Homes, new homes are coming soon to Astor Creek Golf & Country Club by Taylor Morrison . Currently, there is a $0 initiation fee when purchasing a home in Astor Creek with full access to the golf course, clubhouse with resort style amenities including a restaurant and bar. A lifestyle director is on site to coordinate social events along with a sports director with tennis and pickleball. The new 18-hole golf course is the first golf course community to be developed from the ground up by Kolter and designed by architect Chris Wilczynski. Residents have full family golf privileges to the golf shop, 15-acre grass driving range, 3-acre short game complex, and a 15,000 sq. ft. practice putting green. Memberships are available for non-residents. With a total of 682 acres, there will be roughly 900 new homes planned inside this exclusive community ranging from 2 to 6 bedrooms and 1,968 to 5,000+ living square feet. Astor Creek's clubhouse, The 1566 Club, will feature a full bar and restaurant, fitness center powered by EGYM, resort style pool, tennis, pickleball and more. Home prices start from $506,900 not including the homesite or design upgrades. Call 772-301-8524 to learn about $0 lot premiums and incentives towards upgrade options. Learn more GOT IT Boston Herald, 08-08-2024 Astor Creek Golf & Country Club Opens New Sports Court Facilities Click here to read the full article . Ribbon-cutting ceremony and pickleball clinic mark the opening of the community’s pickleball, tennis and basketball courts. PORT SAINT LUCIE, FL / ACCESSWIRE / August 8, 2024 / Astor Creek Golf & Country Club, the Treasure Coast’s first new golf community in decades, hosted a ribbon-cutting ceremony to celebrate the opening of its new pickleball , tennis and basketball courts. The event was sponsored by Kolter Homes and attended by residents, staff, and other VIPs who enjoyed a pickleball clinic that followed the ribbon cutting. Astor Creek Ribbon Cutting Ribbon-cutting celebration for the new Sports Courts at Astor Creek Golf & Country Club. Astor Creeks’ new sports courts are part of the community’s continued growth. Since the community opened for new home sales last October, previous milestones include the opening of the championship golf course & practice facilities and construction start on the clubhouse that will open in 2025. “We are thrilled to unveil our new courts which reflect our commitment to providing a diverse lifestyle experience for our residents,” said Stuart Kennedy, Kolter Homes Community Director at Astor Creek Golf & Country Club. “These facilities are another step toward the clubhouse opening next year.” The 25,000-sq.-ft. Astor Creek Clubhouse will blend the contemporary stylings and features of a sophisticated country club with modern, in-demand amenities and experiences. The clubhouse will feature cutting-edge fitness facilities, dining, an indoor-outdoor full bar & grill, a resort-style pool, and event lawn and services that will offer residents the opportunity to enjoy a well-lived life without leaving the community. Kolter Homes offers 14 floorplans to build on a variety of golf and preserve homesites. Home plans range from two-six bedrooms and offer approximately 1,960 to over 5,000 square feet of living area. Homes are priced from the $500s to over $2 million and include golf membership. A collection of move-in-ready homes is currently available . To learn more about Astor Creek Golf & Country Club, visit AstorCreek.com or call 888-476-3017. Eleven decorated models are open daily to tour. The Kolter Group LLC (together with its affiliates, “Kolter”), based in Delray Beach, Florida, is a private investment firm focused on real estate development and investment. Led by CEO Robert “Bobby” Julien, Kolter operates four residential development business units and has sponsored over $29 billion of realized and in-process residential real estate projects throughout the southeastern United States. •	Kolter has completed 99 residential projects, delivering over 27,800 units. •	Kolter has current investments in 91 residential projects expected to deliver a total of over 65,500 units. Kolter Homes LLC (together with its affiliates, “Kolter Homes”), is focused on the development, construction, and sale of 500-1,500 for-sale single-family units, often as Cresswind branded, age-restricted, amenity-rich master-planned communities. Kolter Homes has sponsored over $16 billion of realized and in-process real estate projects throughout the southeastern United States. •	Kolter Homes has completed 22 projects, delivering over 8,300 residences. •	Kolter Homes has current investments in 29 projects expected to deliver a total of over 24,900 residences. Kolter Homes is Pleased to Announce Astor Creek Golf and Country Club Celebrates One-Year Anniversary With a Beatles Tribute Concert |
                                    Newswire Products Press Release Distribution Press Release Optimizer Media Suite Media Database Media Pitching Media Monitoring Analytics Media Room Pricing Customer Stories Resources Education Blog PR & Earned Media Planner For Journalists RSS Feeds Support Newsroom Log In Sign Up Kolter Homes is Pleased to Announce Astor Creek Golf and Country Club Celebrates One-Year Anniversary With a Beatles Tribute Concert Press Release • Jan 23, 2025 Astor Creek Golf and Country Club in Port St. Lucie, FL PORT SAINT LUCIE, Fla., January 23, 2025 (Newswire.com)
        - Astor Creek Golf and Country Club, Kolter Homes' premier golf community on the Treasure Coast, recently celebrated its one-year anniversary with a free concert featuring the Liverpool Legends Beatles tribute band. Over 300 residents, members, and guests attended the event, enjoying an evening of music, food, and camaraderie. "The past year has been an incredible journey for Astor Creek," said Stuart Kennedy, Community Director at Astor Creek. "We've watched this community grow and thrive, and it's been an honor to be a part of it. This concert was the perfect way to celebrate our first anniversary and thank our residents for making Astor Creek such a special place." Astor Creek, one of the premier new golf communities in Florida , offers a luxurious lifestyle with a signature 18-hole golf course designed by renowned golf course architect Chris Wilczynski. The community will also feature a state-of-the-art clubhouse , resort-style pool, fitness center, pickleball courts, and a variety of social activities. A key feature of Astor Creek is the opportunity for personalization. Each floorplan offers a minimum of 33 Kolter Structural Options (KSO), allowing homeowners to create a home that perfectly suits their lifestyle. Additionally, a selection of move-in ready homes is available, featuring designer-selected fixtures and finishes. Kolter Homes is committed to building exceptional communities and providing an unparalleled living experience. Astor Creek is a testament to this commitment, offering residents a beautiful place to call home. About Astor Creek Golf and Country Club Astor Creek is a premier golf community located in Port St. Lucie, Florida. Developed by Kolter Homes, the community offers luxurious homes, a championship golf course, and a variety of amenities. To learn more, please click here or call 888-476-3017. The Kolter Group LLC (together with its affiliates, "Kolter" ), based in Delray Beach, Florida, is a private investment firm focused on real estate development and investment. Led by CEO Robert "Bobby" Julien, Kolter operates four residential development business units and has sponsored over $29 billion of realized and in-process residential real estate projects throughout the southeastern United States (including Florida, Georgia, South Carolina, North Carolina, and Tennessee). Kolter has completed 99 residential projects, delivering over 27,800 units Kolter has current investments in 91 residential projects expected to deliver a total of over 65,500 units Kolter Homes LLC (together with its affiliates, "Kolter Homes" ), is focused on the development, construction, and sale of 500-1,500 for-sale single-family units, often as Cresswind-branded, age-restricted, amenity-rich master-planned communities, with additional focus on smaller, traditional and age-targeted add-on communities of 100-500 homes. Kolter Homes has sponsored over $16 billion of realized and in-process real estate projects throughout the southeastern United States. Hovnanian Why Wylder Amenities & Lifestyle Gallery FAQ HOA fees Blog Video Tour Schedule a Tour Realtors Floorplans 305-3427413 ASTOR CREEK GOLF & COUNTRY CLUB Astor Creek Golf & Country Club: Premier Living in Port St. Lucie Astor Creek Golf & Country Club is an exclusive, gated community located in the heart of Port St. Lucie, Florida. This premier golf course community is designed for those who seek a modern, luxurious country club lifestyle with world-class amenities and beautiful surroundings. Community Overview Astor Creek is renowned for its picturesque landscapes and a challenging 18-hole championship golf course designed by Christopher Wilczynski. The community features approximately 900 homes, all crafted with contemporary designs and high-end finishes, providing residents with both comfort and elegance. Amenities Residents of Astor Creek Golf & Country Club enjoy an array of top-tier amenities, including: Clubhouse : The 1566 Club, which includes dining rooms, a bar, a golf shop, men’s and women’s locker rooms, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. Outdoor Pool : A stunning resort-style pool with cabanas for ultimate relaxation. Sports Courts : Tennis, pickleball, bocce, and basketball courts are available for all sports enthusiasts. Golf Course : A signature 18-hole golf course featuring forgiving fairways and a playable landscape, perfect for golfers of all skill levels. Practice Facilities : A 15-acre grass driving range, a 3-acre short game complex, and a 15,000 sq. ft. practice putting green Lifestyle and Activities Astor Creek fosters a vibrant community atmosphere with numerous activities and social events throughout the year. Whether you enjoy golfing, swimming, fitness classes, or social gatherings, there’s always something to do. The community also hosts tournaments and outings, making it a perfect place for both relaxation and active living. Location and Accessibility Located conveniently near I-95 and Florida’s Turnpike, Astor Creek provides easy access to the Treasure Coast’s best shopping, dining, and recreational options. The community is just 25 minutes from the beach and 40 minutes north of the Palm Beaches, offering residents both tranquility and convenience. Homes and Real Estate Astor Creek features a variety of luxurious homes with options for 2 to 6 bedrooms. The homes are designed with open floor plans, spacious family kitchens, and large windows that bring in plenty of natural light. Many models include flex rooms, ideal for home offices or playrooms, and second-floor bonus rooms that can be customized as home gyms, extra bedrooms, or in-law suites.
